Description: Pin Oak Village is a thriving apartment community for adults 55 years and over located in Bowie, Maryland. From the beautifully decorated reception lobby to the open, airy entertainment center complete with a handsome grand piano to the brick-paved patio area and sunny gazebo, Pin Oak Village has been perfectly planned for active senior living. Nestled in one of Bowie’s most prominent and established neighborhoods, the community is close to a variety of fine restaurants, shops, theaters, and services for your convenience. Pin Oak Village offers a unique environment, which is perfect for relaxation and recreation. An experienced, on-site team of residential management specialists ensures an unmatched level of personal attention and convenient community service. Every one or two bedroom apartment home at Pin Oak Village features a fully-equipped kitchen with a dishwasher and breakfast bar, as well as individually controlled heating and air conditioning. Like a breath of fresh air in affordable senior living, Pin Oak Village is close to everything, including perfection.

Enjoy popcorn and a movie in the 63-seat theater, socialize with friends in the activity center, or meet new friends at our community events in our multi-purpose area. For your convenience, we have two elevators throughout the community and a controlled-entry access system, which provides for your peace of mind. If you enjoy outdoor living, our park-like setting, picnic area, and walking paths will provide you with hours of pleasure. Small pets are welcomed at Evergreen Senior Community. If you love creating delicious home meals, you will enjoy your fully-equipped kitchen in your one, two, or two bedroom w/den apartment home. And don’t worry about running to the laundromat, because every home is equipped with its own washer and dryer.

Description: The Willows Senior Community offers elegant, worry-free apartment homes for active adults, age 62 years and over. This thriving apartment community in Bowie, Maryland, which was recently named as one of Money Magazine’s Best Places to Live in 2014 (http://time.com/money/3312338/bowie-md-best-places-to-live/), is home to more than 80 seniors who enjoy a wide range of exercise and social activities. Our community has wonderful spaces, which provide excellent opportunities for you to interact with fellow residents. We hold many social events in our multi-purpose entertainment area, with adjoining kitchenette and open lounge area that features a gorgeous balcony. You can work up a sweat or enjoy a yoga class in the fitness center, or challenge a friend to a game in the billiards room. Enjoy the latest bestseller or a classic novel in the library or try out the latest hairstyle in the beauty salon. And if you need to meet with your physician for a check-up, we have a health suite. Choose from our numerous floor plans, which include one, two, or two bedroom with den layouts. Your individually-controlled heating and air-conditioning and wall-to-wall carpeting will provide comfort for you throughout the year. For your convenience, each home has a washer and dryer and 24-hour maintenance service is provided.
